title: Build Claude Context Viewer - Svelte browser app with virtual scrolling for 200K token contexts
description: Browser-based viewer for Claude agent conversation context using Svelte + Node.js with @anthropic-ai/sdk. Handles 200K token contexts with virtual scrolling, Web Workers for parsing, and real-time streaming.

title: Build Claude Context Viewer - Python GUI app with Claude Agent SDK
description: Complete Python application that uses Claude Agent SDK to display and interact with agent conversation context in real-time. Includes Tkinter GUI with color-coded sections, streaming updates, zoom, search, filter, and export features.
